message:
default.nix: add env attribute for development environments

fixes #3

add --eval option

Allows to not use ofborg's evaluation result.
Fixes #4.
allow to build pull request branch instead of nixpkgs merge
filter out failed packages in nix-shell
filter out failed packages in nix-shell
parameter to only build selected packages

move common flags to subcommands

This is more intuitive.
add option to match packages by regex
README: the kernel is no longer rebuild in tests.

Implement support for `nix-review wip` to review uncommited changes

This is the only feature that `nox-review` supports and I'm actually
missing here.

Unstaged (or staged changes with `-s`) will be applied onto the git
workspace in `~/.cache/nix-review/rev-{base hash}-dirty` using `git
apply` and tested after that.

rename to nixpkgs-review

Fix the naming. This tool is specific to nixpkgs.

Keep the bin/nix-review for back-compat.

Fixes #66

Add note about -I argument for nix-build

It took me a minute to figure out why the build failed; this may or may not be
worth including in the readme, but it could help someone.

Add --no-shell arg for non-interactive nixpkgs-review

Usually we want to interactively review, but in some workflows we may want to
use `nixpkgs-review` to batch process a number of PR reviews.

This commit adds a `--no-shell` flag which, when passed, will do everything
except drop into the interactive `nix-shell`, and instead just finish with an
exit code signaling success or failure.
README.md: fix review with comment feature

Implement --post-result function for PR review comments (#93)

This extends `nixpkgs-review` with a `--post-result` flag, active during the `pr` subcommand, that will post a comment on the PR review with the results.


Co-authored-by: Jörg Thalheim <joerg@thalheim.io>

extend github token support

We now also read existing tokens from hub.
add comments command to show issue/review comments

Mention required scope for GITHUB_TOKEN

Closes #104

revert 184696e14e (Allow to cross compile)

This does not work yet when evaluating files
README: Note where to find docs for regex matching

README: grammar improvements

Co-authored-by: Sumner Evans <me@sumnerevans.com>
README: Fix typo in flake command
docs(readme): add node that gh is also supported for token

feature nom: add Readme

Signed-off-by: Florian Brandes <florian.brandes@posteo.de>

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: figsoda <figsoda@pm.me>

change behavior to use `nom` by default

Now, nixpkgs-review will check for `nom` in `PATH` and
use it by default. If it isn't found in `$PATH` it will
default to `nix`.

This can be overridden by the `nom-path` flag, which will take
either the path to `nom` (or a similar build utility) or an empty
string.
If an empty string is passed, it will default to `nix`

Signed-off-by: Florian Brandes <florian.brandes@posteo.de>

change `nom-path` to `nix-flavor`

the argument will now take either `nix` or `nom`.
Will default to `nom`, if available.

Signed-off-by: Florian Brandes <florian.brandes@posteo.de>

change flag to `--build-graph`, change nom url

Signed-off-by: Florian Brandes <florian.brandes@posteo.de>
